Class Specialist

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
characters.Hero
characters.heroes.Specialist
All Implemented Interfaces:
combat.Combatant, Serializable
public class Specialist extends Hero
Represents a subclass of Hero called Specialist. Specialists are highly trained humans who fight for justice without superpowers. They rely heavily on weapons and are proficient in multiple types. Real-world analogs include Batman, Hawkeye, and Green Arrow. This class introduces a preferred weapon mechanic, granting bonus damage when the Specialist uses their favored weapon type.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Specialist

      public Specialist(String nome, int healthPoints, int willPoints, int strength, int preferredWeapon)
      Constructs a Specialist hero with the given attributes and preferred weapon type.
      Parameters:
      nome - the name of the Specialist
      healthPoints - initial health points
      willPoints - initial will points
      strength - initial strength value
      preferredWeapon - index of the preferred weapon (0 = Sword, 1 = Gauntlet, 2 = Pistol)

  • Method Details

    • getAttackDamage

      public int getAttackDamage()
      Calculates the attack damage dealt by the Specialist. Adds +4 damage if the equipped weapon matches the preferred weapon type.
      Returns:
      the total damage dealt

    • setWeapon

      public void setWeapon(items.Weapon newWeapon)
      Equips a new weapon and updates the corresponding entry in the Specialist's weapon list. Prevents duplicate weapon types in the internal array.
      Specified by:
      setWeapon in interface combat.Combatant
      Overrides:
      setWeapon in class Hero
      Parameters:
      newWeapon - the weapon to equip

    • useSpecialSkill

      public void useSpecialSkill(combat.Combatant target)
      Executes the Specialist's special skill: "Versatility".
      Parameters:
      target - the combatant receiving the damage
